thoughts.content: Music is the language of the soul, expressing what words cannot.
thoughts.author: Unknown

thoughts.content: Without music, life would be a mistake.
thoughts.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

thoughts.content: Music can change the world because it can change people.
thoughts.author: Bono

thoughts.content: Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and life to everything.
thoughts.author: Plato

thoughts.content: I think music in itself is healing. It's an explosive expression of humanity. It's something we are all touched by. No matter what culture we're from, everyone loves music.
thoughts.author: Billy Joel

thoughts.content: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
thoughts.author: Berthold Auerbach

thoughts.content: Life seems to go on without effort when I am filled with music.
thoughts.author: George Eliot

thoughts.content: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
thoughts.author: Bob Marley
